definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: wait, hope (Aramaism; cf. Aram. [[סְבַר]] think, Pa. hope; sabara believe, hope, Pa. think, Aph. hope);—Pf. 1 S [[שִׂבַּרְתִּי]] Ps 119:166, 3 pl. [[שִׂבְּרוּ]] Es 9:1; Impf. 3 mpl. [[יְשַׂבְּרוּ]] Is 38:18, [[יְשַׂבֵָּרוּ]] Ps 145:15, [[יְשַׂבֵּרָוּן]] Ps 104:27; 2 fpl. [[תְּשַׂבֵּרְנׇה]] Ru 1:13;—
hope for, [[ל]] rei Ps 119:166, [[אֶל]] rei Is 38:18, [[אֶל]] pers. Ps 104:27, Ps 145:15; [[ל]] inf. Es 9:1 hope to rule.
